text.en: Beyond words, beyond thought, beyond description, Prajñāpāramitā
text.en-trans: ma sam jö mé sherab parol chin

text.en: Unborn, unceasing, the very essence of space
text.en-trans: makyé mingak namkhé ngowo nyi

text.en: Yet it can be experienced as the wisdom of our own rigpa:
text.en-trans: soso rangrig yeshe chöyulwa

text.en: Homage to the mother of the buddhas of past, present and future!
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwé yum la chaktsal lo

text.en: In the language of India:
text.en-trans: gyagar ké du

text.en: Bhagavatī prajñāpāramitā hṛdaya
text.en-trans: bhagavati prajnaparamita hridaya

text.en: In the language of Tibet:
text.en-trans: böké du

text.en: Chomden dema sherab kyi parol tu chinpé nyingpo
text.en-trans: chomden dema sherab kyi parol tu chinpé nyingpo

text.en: In the English language:The Blessed Mother, the Heart of the Transcendent Perfection of Wisdom
In a single segment.
text.en-trans: bampo chik go

text.en: Homage to the Bhagavatī Prajñāpāramitā!
text.en-trans: chomden dema sherab kyi parol tu chinpa la chaktsal lo

text.en: Thus have I heard:
text.en-trans: diké dak gi töpa dü chik na

text.en: At one time the Blessed One was dwelling in Rājgṛha at Vulture Peak mountain, together with a great community of
text.en-trans: chomdendé gyalpö khab jagö pungpö ri la gelong gi gendün chenpo dang

text.en: monks and a great community of bodhisattvas.
text.en-trans: changchub sempé gendün chenpo dang tab chik tu zhuk té

text.en: At that time, the Blessed One entered an absorption on categories of phenomena called ‘perception of the profound’.
text.en-trans: dé tsé chomdendé zabmo nangwa zhejawa chö kyi namdrang kyi ting ngé dzin la nyompar zhuk so

text.en: At the same time, noble Avalokiteśvara, the bodhisattva and great being, beheld the practice of the profound perfection of wisdom,
text.en-trans: yang dé tsé changchub sempa sempa chenpo pakpa chenrezik wangchuk sherab kyi parol tu chinpa zabmo chöpa nyi la nampar ta zhing

text.en: And saw that the five aggregates are empty of nature.
text.en-trans: pungpo ngapo dedak la yang rangzhin gyi tongpar nampar ta o

text.en: Then, through the Buddha's power,
text.en-trans: dené sangye kyi tü

text.en: Venerable Śāriputra said to noble Avalokiteśvara, the bodhisattva and great being:
text.en-trans: tsé dang denpa sharibü changchub sempa sempa chenpo pakpa chenrezik wangchuk la diké ché mé so

text.en: “How should a child of noble family who wishes to practise the profound perfection of wisdom train?”
text.en-trans: rik kyi bu gang lala sherab kyi parol tu chinpa zabmo chöpa chepar döpa dé jitar labpar ja

text.en: This is what he said, and the noble Avalokiteśvara, the bodhisattva and great being, replied to venerable Śāriputra as follows:
text.en-trans: deké ché mepa dang | changchub sempa sempa chenpo pakpa chenrezik wangchuk gi tsé dang denpa shara datibu la diké ché mé so

text.en: “O Śāriputra, a son of noble family or daughter of noble family who wishes to practise the profound perfection of wisdom should regard things in this way:
text.en-trans: sharibu rik kyi bu am rik kyi bumo gang lala sherab kyi parol tu chinpa zabmo chöpa chepar döpa dé ditar nampar tawar ja té

text.en: They should see the five aggregates to be empty of nature.
text.en-trans: pungpo ngapo dedak kyang rangzhin gyi tongpar nampar yangdakpar jesu ta o

text.en: Form is empty; emptiness is form;
text.en-trans: zuk tongpa o | tongpanyi kyang zuk so

text.en: Emptiness is not other than form;
text.en-trans: zuk lé tongpanyi zhen mayin no

text.en: Form is not other than emptiness.
text.en-trans: tongpanyi lé kyang zuk zhen mayin no

text.en: In the same way, sensation, recognition,
text.en-trans: dezhindu tsorwa dang | dushé dang

text.en: Conditioning factors and consciousness are emptiness.
text.en-trans: dujé dang | nampar shepa nam tongpa o

text.en: Therefore, Śāriputra, all dharmas are emptiness.
text.en-trans: sharibu detawé na chö tamché tongpanyi dé

text.en: They are without characteristics; they are unarisen and unceasing;
text.en-trans: tsennyi mepa | makyepa | magakpa

text.en: They are not tainted and not untainted;
text.en-trans: drima mepa | drima dang dralwa mepa

text.en: They are not deficient and not complete.
text.en-trans: driwa mepa | gangwa mepa o

text.en: Therefore, Śāriputra, in emptiness, there is no form,
text.en-trans: sharibu detawé na tongpanyi la zukmé

text.en: No sensation, no recognition, no conditioning factors, no consciousness;
text.en-trans: tsorwa mé | dushé mé | dujé nam mé | nampar shepa mé

text.bo: མིག་མེད། རྣ་བ་མེད། སྣ་མེད། ལྕེ་མེད། ལུས་མེད། ཡིད་མེད།
text.en: No eye, no ear, no nose, no tongue, no body, no mind;
text.en-trans: mik mé | nawa mé | na mé | che mé | lü mé | yi mé

text.bo: གཟུགས་མེད། སྒྲ་མེད། དྲི་མེད། རོ་མེད། རེག་བྱ་མེད། ཆོས་མེད་དོ། །
text.en: No visible form, no sound, no odour, no taste, no texture, and no mental objects;
text.en-trans: zuk mé | dra mé | dri mé | ro mé | rekja mé | chö mé do

text.en: There is no eye element up to no mind element;
text.en-trans: mik gi kham mepa né yi kyi kham mé

text.en: And as far as no mental consciousness element;
text.en-trans: yi kyi nampar shepé kham kyi bardu yang mé do

text.en: There is no ignorance, no extinction of ignorance up to no old age and death,
text.en-trans: marikpa mé | marikpa zepa mepa né gashi mé

text.en: No extinction of old age and death;
text.en-trans: gashi zepé bardu yang mé do

text.en: No suffering, no origin,
text.en-trans: dukngalwa dang | künjungwa dang

text.en: No cessation, no path, no wisdom, no attainment,
text.en-trans: gokpa dang | lam mé | yeshe mé | tobpa mé

text.en: And no non-attainment.
text.en-trans: matobpa yang mé do

text.en: Therefore, Śāriputra, since bodhisattvas have no attainment,
text.en-trans: sharibu detawé na changchub sempa nam tobpa mepé chir

text.en: They rely on and abide by the perfection of wisdom.
text.en-trans: sherab kyi parol tu chinpa la ten ching né té

text.en: Since their minds are unobscured, they have no fear.
text.en-trans: sem la dribpa mepé trakpa mé dé

text.en: They completely transcend error and reach the ultimate nirvāṇa.
text.en-trans: chin chi lok lé shintu dé né nya ngen lé depé tarchin to

text.en: All the buddhas throughout the three times
text.en-trans: dü sum du nampar zhukpé sangye tamché kyang sherab kyi parol tu chinpa la ten né

text.en: Fully awaken to unsurpassable, true, complete enlightenment by means of the perfection of wisdom.
text.en-trans: lana mepa yangdakpar dzokpé changchub tu ngönpar dzokpar sangye so

text.en: Therefore, the mantra of the perfection of wisdom—
text.en-trans: detawé na sherab kyi parol tu chinpé ngak

text.en: The mantra of great insight, the unsurpassed mantra,
text.en-trans: rigpa chenpö ngak | lana mepé ngak

text.en: The mantra that equals the unequalled, the mantra that pacifies all suffering—
text.en-trans: minyampa dang nyampé ngak | dukngal tamché rabtu zhiwar jepé ngak

text.en: Is not false and should be understood as true.
text.en-trans: midzünpé na denpar shepar ja té

text.en: The mantra of the perfection of wisdom is proclaimed as follows:
text.en-trans: sherab kyi parol tu chinpé ngak mepa

text.en: tadyathā | oṃ gate gate pāragate | pārasaṃgate | bodhi svāhā
text.en-trans: teyata | om gaté gaté para gaté | para samgaté | bodhi soha

text.en: Śāriputra, a bodhisattva and great being should train in the profound perfection of wisdom in this way.”
text.en-trans: sharibu changchub sempa sempa chenpö detar sherab kyi parol tu chinpa zabmo la labpar ja o

text.en: Thereupon, the Blessed One arose from that absorption
text.en-trans: dené chomdendé ting ngé dzin dé lé zheng té

text.en: And commended Avalokiteśvara, the bodhisattva and great being:
text.en-trans: changchub sempa sempa chenpo pakpa chenrezik wangchuk la lek so zhejawa jin né

text.en: “Excellent, excellent, O son of noble family, that is how it is. That is just how it is.
text.en-trans: lek so lek so | rik kyi bu de dezhin no | rik kyi bu de dezhin té

text.en: One should practise the profound perfection of wisdom just as you have taught
text.en-trans: jitar khyö kyi tenpa dezhindu sherab kyi parol tu chinpa zabmo la chepar ja té

text.en: And then even the tathāgatas will rejoice.”
text.en-trans: dezhin shekpa nam kyang jesu yi rang ngo

text.en: When the Blessed One had said this,
text.en-trans: chomdendé kyi deké ché katsal né

text.en: Venerable Śāriputra, and
text.en-trans: tsé dang denpa sharibu dang

text.en: Noble Avalokiteśvara, the bodhisattva and great being,
text.en-trans: changchub sempa sempa chenpo pakpa chenrezik wangchuk dang

text.en: Together with the whole assembly and the world of gods, human beings,
text.en-trans: tamché dang denpé khor dedak dang | lha dang | mi dang

text.en: Asuras and gandharvas rejoiced and praised
text.en-trans: lha mayin dang | drizar chepé jikten yi rang té

text.en: The speech of the Blessed One.
text.en-trans: chomdendé kyi sungpa la ngönpar tö do

text.en: Thus concludes the Mahāyāna Sūtra of the Blessed Mother, the Heart of the Transcendent Perfection of Wisdom.
text.en-trans: chomden dema sherab kyi parol tu chinpé nyingpo zhejawa tekpa chenpö do dzok so

text.en: tadyathā | oṃ gate gate pāragate | pārasaṃgate | bodhi svāhā
text.en-trans: teyata | om gaté gaté para gaté | para samgaté | bodhi soha

text.en: Namo! Homage to the Guru!
text.en-trans: namo, lama la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to the Buddha!
text.en-trans: sangye la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to the Dharma!
text.en-trans: chö la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to the Saṅgha!
text.en-trans: gendün la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to the Great Mother, Prajñāpāramitā!
text.en-trans: yum chenmo sherab kyi parol tu chinpa la chaktsal lo

text.en: Through the power and strength of paying homage to you,
text.en-trans: khyé nam la chaktsalwé tu dang nüpa la ten né

text.en: May these words of ours come true!
text.en-trans: dakchak gi tsik di drubpar gyur chik

text.en: Just as, long ago, the king of the gods Indra, by the power and strength of contemplating the profound meaning of the perfection of wisdom, the Great Mother, and reciting its words,
text.en-trans: jitar ngön lhé wangpo gyajin gyi yum chenmo sherab kyi parol tu chinpé dön zabmo yi la sam zhing tsik khatön du jepé tu dang nüpa la ten né

text.en: Was able to avert the demonic forces of negativity, so in the very same way, may we too, through the power and strength of contemplating the profound meaning of the Perfection of Wisdom, the Great Mother, and reciting its words,
text.en-trans: dü dikchen lasokpa chir dokpa dezhindu dak gi kyang yum chenmo sherab kyi parol tu chinpé dön zabmo yi la sam zhing tsik khatön du jepé tu dang nüpa la ten né

text.en: Avert all the negative influences which prevent us and those around us from accomplishing the Noble Dharma!
text.en-trans: dak khor dang chepé dampé chö drubpé pangja mitünpé chok tamché chir dokpar gyur chik

text.en: May they be annihilated!
text.en-trans: mepar gyur chik

text.en: May they be rendered harmless!
text.en-trans: zhiwar gyur chik

text.en: May they be completely pacified!
text.en-trans: rabtu zhiwar gyur chik

text.en: Everything that arises interdependently
text.en-trans: gang gi ten ching drelwar jung

text.en: Is unceasing and unborn,
text.en-trans: gakpa mepa kyé mepa

text.en: Neither non-existent nor everlasting,
text.en-trans: chepa mepa tak mepa

text.en: Neither coming nor going,
text.en-trans: ongwa mepa dro mepa

text.en: Neither multiple nor single.
text.en-trans: tadé dön min dön chik min

text.en: To this teaching that pacifies all concepts and duality,
text.en-trans: tröpa nyerzhi zhi tönpa

text.en: The most sacred speech of the fully enlightened Buddha,
text.en-trans: dzokpé sangye ma nam kyi

text.en: We pay homage!
text.en-trans: dampa dé la chaktsal lo

text.en: May all obstacles,
text.en-trans: dzokpé changchub drubpa la

text.en: Outer and inner,
text.en-trans: chi dang nang gi tsewa yi

text.en: To our attaining complete enlightenment,
text.en-trans: bardu chöpa tamché kün

text.en: Be totally pacified!
text.en-trans: nyewar zhiwar dzé du sol

text.en: Also, in this very life,
text.en-trans: zhenyang kyewa dinyi du

text.en: May everything inharmonious be pacified, and
text.en-trans: mitün chok kün zhiwa dang

text.en: May we always enjoy peace and happiness, long life,
text.en-trans: tsering nemé pünsum tsok

text.en: Good health, prosperity and success!
text.en-trans: taktu dé dangden gyur chik
